Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/container.c and /std/basic/wearable.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/virtual.h and /include/move_failures.h

query_scabbard
int query_scabbard()
This method determines if the object is a scabbard or not.

Returns:
always returns 1 for a scabbard
query_types

This method returns the types of weapons that can be sheathed in the scabbard.

Returns:
the types that can be sheathed

This method sets the types of weapons that can be sheathed in the scabbard.

Parameters:
words - the array of types that can be sheathed
